org.sql: SELECT email_addresses.* FROM email_addresses WHERE email_addresses.user_id = "$1" AND email_addresses.is_default = "$2" ORDER BY email_addresses.id ASC

rewrites.sql: SELECT email_addresses.* FROM email_addresses WHERE email_addresses.user_id = "$1" AND email_addresses.is_default = "$2" ORDER BY email_addresses.id ASC LIMIT 1
